About me
Have you ever had a dream of accomplishing more? It's something I carry on as my goal throughout my life. I'm not afraid of challenges and I enjoy learning and evolving. When I was 20 I got my Bachelor's degree and moved to another country to study for Master's. And that was just the fun beginning of my adventure! I've moved to the USA almost 6 years ago and for 5 years I've been living in NYC.

I went through a UX/UI Immersion program at Thinkful for my career pivot. I enjoy working with people and for people, analyzing, defining, and creating for a better tomorrow.

Design
My experience in team management, hospitality, and international relations help me in my approach to design. I'm obsessed with typography, design challenges, and usability.
I see a design process as creative problem-solving which puts user needs in the center.

Books

Traveling

Being a cat mom ;)

Last note
I'm super organized and love it when everything is done on time.
My ultimate goal is to remain positive mindset and always listen at first.
Feel free to reach out to me!
